## Learning Outcomes

::: {.callout-important title="Principal Learning Outcome 4"}
Describe the function of the liver, adipose tissue, and other metabolic tissues in retaining homeostasis through hormonal and neural regulation.
:::

After this lecture, you should be able to:

1. Describe and understand the endocrine roles of the pancreas

2. Understand how (cell-specific) metabolic pathways relate to physiological function of organs and tissues.

3.  Understand how adipose tissue (white and brown) contribute to energy homeostasis.
